Title: CIS Docker Community Edition Benchmark v1.1.0

SummaryControls.Name: Ensure a user for the container has been created
Ensure that containers use trusted base images (Manual)
Ensure unnecessary packages are not installed in the container (Manual)
Ensure images are scanned and rebuilt to include security patches
Ensure Content trust for Docker is Enabled (Manual)
Ensure HEALTHCHECK instructions have been added to the container image
Ensure update instructions are not use alone in the Dockerfile
Ensure setuid and setgid permissions are removed in the images (Manual)
Ensure COPY is used instead of ADD in Dockerfile
Ensure secrets are not stored in Dockerfiles
Ensure verified packages are only Installed (Manual)
